Serialized Form

  • Package il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment

    • Class il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.ExperimentBatch extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      6642440624914572020L

      • Serialized Fields

        • nextExperimentNumToAssign

          int nextExperimentNumToAssign

        • experimentIdToExperimentSettings

          ofergivoli.olib.data_structures.map.SafeMap<K,V> experimentIdToExperimentSettings
          The experiment id should be a valid filename.

    • Class il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.ExperimentSettings extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8508792813064989008L

      • Serialized Fields

        • tagNameToValue

          ofergivoli.olib.data_structures.map.SafeMap<K,V> tagNameToValue
          Tags contain information about the experiment that isn't used when executing the experiment.

        • deterministic

          boolean deterministic
          The execution of the experiment should be deterministic (might slightly increase execution time).

        • testDomainId

          java.lang.String testDomainId
          Should not be null in in-domain and zero-shot setups. May be null in any other setup (e.g. training on all training data without evaluation).

        • setupType

          ExperimentSettings.SetupType setupType

        • trainingExampleIds

          java.util.List<E> trainingExampleIds
          Actual train examples to be used. For 2-step training experiments, the split of these examples over the two steps is defined by ExperimentSettings.firstStepTrainingDomainIds. Implementation note: We don't want to reference the examples themselves because we want to keep the serialized representation of this object small (so it could be quickly transferred to remote hosts).

        • testExampleIds

          java.util.List<E> testExampleIds
          Actual test examples to be used.

        • iterationsNum

          int iterationsNum
          The number of train-test iteration to perform. The test/dev set is tested after each training iteration (and is reported as part of that iteration's results). For 2-step training experiments, this defines the iterations number of the second step. For evaluation-only setup this should be 1.

        • shuffleTrainingExamplesBetweenIterations

          boolean shuffleTrainingExamplesBetweenIterations

        • regularizationCoefficient

          double regularizationCoefficient

        • initStepSize

          double initStepSize
          Corresponds to Params.Options#initStepSize.

        • lazyL1FullUpdateFreq

          int lazyL1FullUpdateFreq
          Corresponds to Params.Options#lazyL1FullUpdateFreq, except that -1 means using non-lazy regularization.

        • beamSize

          int beamSize
          Max number of derivations to keep in a cell during inference.

        • maxNgramLengthForLexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeatures

          int maxNgramLengthForLexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeatures
          The value for PhrasePredicateFeatureComputer.Options#maxNforLexicalizeAllPairs.

        • maxDerivationSize

          int maxDerivationSize
          The value for FloatingParser.Options#maxDepth

        • testOnTrainSetAfterAllIterations

          boolean testOnTrainSetAfterAllIterations
          when true, after all training iterations are done we test on the training set without modifying the weifghts (i.e. with the same weights used for testing on the test set in the last iteration).

        • useAppLogicFiltering

          boolean useAppLogicFiltering

        • useLexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeatures

          boolean useLexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeatures

        • extractUnlexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeaturesWithoutPos

          boolean extractUnlexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeaturesWithoutPos

        • usePredicatesThatAreProbablyDomainSpecificForExtractingLexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeatures

          boolean usePredicatesThatAreProbablyDomainSpecificForExtractingLexicalizedPhrasePredicateFeatures

        • useDescriptionPhraseFeatures

          boolean useDescriptionPhraseFeatures

        • enableInstructionFeatures

          java.lang.Boolean enableInstructionFeatures
          When this is false, we don't use any features beyond those already extracted by Sempre. null is equivalent to true (for backward compatibility).

        • unconditionalWeightUpdateFraction

          java.lang.Double unconditionalWeightUpdateFraction
          This value is in the range (0,1], and it's the potion wight updates that gets carried out regardless of existence of evidence suggesting the update is useful for multiple domains. When null we do full unconditional updates (i.e. as if the value if 1.0).

        • domainsNumberRequiredForCwu

          java.lang.Integer domainsNumberRequiredForCwu
          CWU = conditional weight update. Should be null only if unconditionalWeightUpdateFraction is null.

        • twoStepTraining

          boolean twoStepTraining

        • firstStepRegularizationCoefficient

          java.lang.Double firstStepRegularizationCoefficient
          If null and it's a 2-step training experiment, then the value of ExperimentSettings.regularizationCoefficient is used. Should be null when it's not a 2-step training experiment.

        • firstStepInitStepSize

          java.lang.Double firstStepInitStepSize
          If null and it's a 2-step training experiment, then the value of ExperimentSettings.initStepSize is used. Should be null when it's not a 2-step training experiment.

        • firstStepIterationsNum

          java.lang.Integer firstStepIterationsNum
          null iff the experiment is not a 2-step training experiment.

        • firstStepTrainingDomainIds

          java.util.List<E> firstStepTrainingDomainIds
          All domains not in this list, and excluding the test domain, will be used as training in the second step. null iff the experiment is not a 2-step training experiment.

        • domainOrdering

          java.util.List<E> domainOrdering
          The domain ordering used to define the partition of domains into first and second steps. null iff the experiment is not a 2-step training experiment.

        • initialWeightsFileAbsoluteOrRelativeToExperimentDir

          java.io.File initialWeightsFileAbsoluteOrRelativeToExperimentDir
          If not null, the initial weights are read from this file.

        • featuresGeneralityScoresXml

          java.io.File featuresGeneralityScoresXml
          Can be null if not used. Note: this is not Path because this class needs to be serializable.

        • numOfFeaturesToUpdateWeightsForInStep2

          java.lang.Integer numOfFeaturesToUpdateWeightsForInStep2
          Must be null in non 2-step experiments. In 2-step experiments, if this is null, then all features get their weights updated in the second step. If not null, the features that get their weights updated are those that have the top generality score, determined by ExperimentSettings.featuresGeneralityScoresXml.

        • featuresAllowedToBeExtractedNum

          java.lang.Integer featuresAllowedToBeExtractedNum
          When not null, only the this many features are allowed to be extracted (those with highest generality score, even if due to other options they are not in practice extracted). This field can hold a value higher than the total number of features in the feature generality scores file.

        • analysisSettings

          ExperimentAnalysisSettings analysisSettings

  • Package il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.analysis

    • Class il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.analysis.CandidateLogicalForm extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      8901836796622146470L

      • Serialized Fields

        • correctDenotation

          boolean correctDenotation

        • score

          double score
          The sum of [feature-value * weight] over all features.

        • scoreOfTopLogicalForms

          double scoreOfTopLogicalForms

        • logicalForm

          NliMethodCallFormula logicalForm

        • featureToValuesAndScoreGain

          ofergivoli.olib.data_structures.map.SafeMap<K,V> featureToValuesAndScoreGain
          Key: a feature extracted for this candidate logical form. Value: left - feature value; right - [feature value] * [feature weight]. May be null in case the user prefers not to include this data.

    • Class il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.analysis.ExperimentAnalysisSettings extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8935934564571350265L

      • Serialized Fields

        • saveLogicalFormsOfTopPredictedDerivationsForTestInferences

        • saveFunctionCallsOfTopPredictedDerivationsForTestInferences

          boolean saveFunctionCallsOfTopPredictedDerivationsForTestInferences

        • buildFeatureAndDomainToGradientSumMap

          boolean buildFeatureAndDomainToGradientSumMap

        • copyToAnalysisDirWeightFiles

          boolean copyToAnalysisDirWeightFiles

        • copyToAnalysisDirNonFinalWeightFiles

          boolean copyToAnalysisDirNonFinalWeightFiles
          If this is true, copyToAnalysisDirWeightFiles should also be true.

        • saveAllCandidateLogicalFormsWithTheirFeatureData

          boolean saveAllCandidateLogicalFormsWithTheirFeatureData
          This should be true only when the number of inferences is very low.

        • saveFeatureDataForCandidateLogicalFormsInAllTestExamples

          boolean saveFeatureDataForCandidateLogicalFormsInAllTestExamples
          TODO: delete this - not used (appears in XMLs). This should be true only when the number of inferences is very low.

        • saveAllDerivations

          boolean saveAllDerivations

        • logMemoryUsage

          boolean logMemoryUsage

        • collectAggregatedAnalysisDataForCWU

          boolean collectAggregatedAnalysisDataForCWU

        • logDerivationDepthOrSize

          boolean logDerivationDepthOrSize

    • Class il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.parser.experiment.analysis.FeatureDataForCandidateLogicalFormsInMultipleExamples extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields
